mapper.insert: insert into review_board(theme_id, member_id, region_id, title, content, latitude, longitude, address) values(#{themeId}, #{writer.memberId}, #{regionId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{address});
mapper.select: select rb.review_board_id, rb.title, rb.created_date, rb.content, rb.latitude, rb.longitude, rb.views, rb.address, c, t.theme_id, t.theme_name, r.region_id, r.region_name, m.member_id, m.nickname, m.photo, rp.review_photo_id, rp.photo as review_photo from review_board rb inner join region r on rb.region_id=r.region_id inner join theme t on rb.theme_id=t.theme_id left outer join member m on m.member_id=rb.member_id left outer join review_photo rp on rp.review_board_id=rb.review_board_id left outer join (select review_board_id, count(member_id) c from review_like group by review_board_id) as rl on rl.review_board_id=rb.review_board_id where rb.review_board_id=#{reviewBoardId}
mapper.update: update review_board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, address=#{address}, region_id=#{regionId}, theme_id=#{themeId} where review_board_id=#{reviewBoardId}
update review_board set views = views+1 where review_board_id=#{reviewBoardId}
mapper.select: select rb.review_board_id, rb.title, m.member_id, m.nickname, r.region_name, rb.created_date, rb.views, count(rl.member_id) as member_count, rp.photo from review_board rb left join member m on rb.member_id = m.member_id left join region r on r.region_id = rb.region_id left join review_like rl on rb.review_board_id = rl.review_board_id left join review_photo rp on rp.review_board_id = rb.review_board_id where rb.member_id =#{memberId} group by rb.review_board_id, rb.title, m.member_id, m.nickname, r.region_name, rb.created_date, rb.views order by rb.review_board_id desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
select count(review_board_id) as countPostedByMember from review_board where member_id=#{memberId};

select rs.review_board_id, rb.title, r.region_name, m.member_id, m.nickname, rb.created_date, rb.views, count(rl.member_id) as c, rp.photo from review_scrap rs left join review_board rb on rs.review_board_id = rb.review_board_id left join member m on rb.member_id = m.member_id left join region r on rb.region_id = r.region_id left join review_like rl on rl.review_board_id = rs.review_board_id left join review_photo rp on rp.review_board_id = rs.review_board_id where rs.member_id=#{memberId} group by rs.review_board_id, rb.title, r.region_name, m.member_id, m.nickname, rb.created_date, rb.views order by rb.review_board_id desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
select count(*) as countScrapByMember from review_scrap where member_id = #{memberId};

select rb.review_board_id, rb.title, rb.created_date, rb.views, m.nickname, t.theme_name, r.region_name, rp.photo from review_board rb inner join member m on m.member_id = rb.member_id inner join theme t on rb.theme_id = t.theme_id inner join region r on r.region_id = rb.region_id left outer join review_photo rp on rp.review_board_id = rb.review_board_id left outer join (select review_board_id, count(member_id) c from review_like group by review_board_id) as rl on rl.review_board_id = rb.review_board_id group by review_board_id order by created_date desc limit 5

select rb.review_board_id, rb.title, rb.created_date, rb.views, c, m.nickname, t.theme_name, r.region_name, rp.photo from review_board rb inner join member m on m.member_id = rb.member_id inner join theme t on rb.theme_id = t.theme_id inner join region r on r.region_id=rb.region_id left outer join review_photo rp on rp.review_board_id = rb.review_board_id left outer join (select review_board_id, count(member_id) c from review_like group by review_board_id) as rl on rl.review_board_id=rb.review_board_id group by rb.review_board_id order by c desc limit 5
